document_data.name: Nalmissra
document_data.mainbody: '''Nalmissra''' was a [[succubus]] who had a connection with [[Watcher's Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities:
Nalmissra possessed some inherent resistances that were typically found in [[demon]]ic beings, such as natural [[regeneration]].

Her kiss could [[charm]] others and even [[energy drain|drain them of their life force]].
document_data.Activities: Nalmissra and her companions served as one of the three groups connected to the fifth level of Watcher's Keep, which held the final seal that kept away the being known as the [[Imprisoned One]]. The group was summoned to the keep when the ''heart key'' was used to unlock the seal.
document_data.Relationships: Her allies included her fellow demons [[Xei Win Toh]], [[Y'tossi]], and the [[Huntress]], along with the [[drow]] [[Ameralis Zauviir]] and an unnamed [[hive mother]].
document_data.History: Nalmissra was killed in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, when [[Abdel Adrian]] and his companions bypassed the final seal of Watcher's Keep and ventured down to reach the Imprisoned One.
